title: APA ethical principles to ensure human participant

content.prompt: Dr. Bell works with young children who need help to manage their anxiety. By following the principle of nonmalficence, which of the following is Dr. Bell doing for his clients?

choices.label: Paying them for their time and trouble.
Making sure they have not participated in research in the past.
Protecting them from physical and psychological harm.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
